text: Xexocom, sometimes erroneously spelled Xexecom, is a hamlet in the municipality of Nebaj, in the Quiché Department of Guatemala.http://www.noguff.com/food/news/Xexecom.html It is located just below the Guatemalan Altiplano and has roughly 25 households. The hamlet has a school house. ==References== Category:Populated places in Guatemala Category:Quiché Department
title: Xexocom
